synopsis.text: In a remote and lonely setting, a mysterious man creates an android girl. As he shows her around their isolated world, he attempts to educate her on everyday objects and activities. However, his true motives remain unclear. Is he simply trying to create a companion, or does he have a more sinister purpose in mind? The minimalistic animation and eerie atmosphere suggest there may be dark secrets lurking beneath the surface. As the android struggles to understand human behavior and her own identity, tensions build towards an unsettling revelation about her creator's intentions. This thought-provoking anime short leaves viewers questioning what it means to be human and the ethics of creating artificial life. Evocative visuals and an ambiguous, open-ended narrative come together to explore existential themes about consciousness and connection. Those seeking a meditative viewing experience will be drawn into this minimalist sci-fi mood piece.
